quotes: [00:08:30] When I went to prison in Illinois, it was different than it is now. Education was very available to you. You had access to all of that and some you even had access to trades.

So make them pay how you make them pay. Get educated.
explanation: The interviewee suggests that his pursuit of education while in prison led to his resilience and ability to adapt and survive in difficult circumstances.
